overview: The first all-women Western. Set in a fictional 1850, the movie is about one woman's attempt to recruit others for an all-women commune.  "..a Warholesque frolic"  --  Daphne Davis, Women's Wear Daily  "  Some great comments about women, men and the pros and cons of living with either."  -- Women & Film: International Festival, 1973  "A group of wonderfully idiosyncratic women improvise characters close to their real lives and fantasy lives. Funny, ambling, off-handedly lyrical, the film....is above all excellent for sharing warm feelings in a group."  -- Ms. magazine
title: The Women's Happy Time Commune
